title: WTA Finals tennis: Iga Swiatek v Amanda Anisimova; Elena Rybakina beats Ekaterina Alexandrova – live
summary: Taha Hashim will be hosting the latest group-stage matches of the season-ending tournament. Fans can expect an exciting lineup of games as teams vie for a spot in the next round. Stay tuned for updates and highlights from the matches.

title: Second accidental release of prisoner ‘utterly unacceptable’, No 10 says, as Lammy blames system left by Tories – UK politics live
summary: During Prime Minister's Questions, David Lammy, representing Keir Starmer, refrained from addressing inquiries regarding a recent case of mistaken release. His silence on the issue sparked criticism and raised concerns about accountability. The focus remains on the implications of the incident for government policy.

title: Republicans file lawsuit challenging California’s redistricting measure
summary: Prop 50, approved by voters, empowers the legislature to redraw congressional maps. This change is expected to favor Democratic representation in the House. The move sparks discussions about political influence in redistricting processes.

title: Qarabag v Chelsea: Champions League – live
summary: Join John Brewin for live updates as Chelsea embarks on their lengthy away journey to Baku. Follow minute-by-minute coverage of the match. Stay tuned for all the action and highlights throughout the game.

title: US supreme court’s liberal justices express skepticism over Trump’s justification of tariffs – live updates
summary: The Supreme Court has begun hearing oral arguments regarding the legality of Donald Trump's tariffs. The case examines both the justification for and opposition to these trade measures. The outcome could have significant implications for U.S. trade policy and presidential authority.
